ygData.subject: Re: Another bard guide idea - also harpers?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... -- ... -- ... I have seen one along the lines of what you describe.  I agree it would be useful and I can see myself with a hotkey containing the URL to
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Reece, Tom - 2
5IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...> wrote:
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
--
> I propose that we on this list work together on creating a guide that
> educates all non-bards on the Do's and Dont's when grouping with a bard.
> The guide would include a basic explanation of bard tactics and the
> situations when they are used. The guide would not need to have a complete
> analysis of our songs, just the key ones.
>
> Once the guide is completed, we send it out to all the major EQ websites
> labeling it as the Official Playing Guide for Non-bards published by the
> EQBards Onelist community, the definitive authorities on all things bardic
> (or something else along those lines:-).
--
>
> Let me know what you think.
>
> Galtin of E'ci




I have seen one along the lines of what you describe. I agree it would be useful
and I can see myself with a hotkey containing the URL to it.

A separate question - where did the song guide from harpers get moved? I seem to
recall it said it would be moved not deleted but I didn't jot down the destination.
http://www.harpers.net/bard/index.htm






===
===Maravana Vireo of the Jus Divinum
===maravana@...
===Bard of 33 Songs
===Mithaniel Marr
